name: Poly Island Art-Tangram Puzzle
description:
PolygonArt - Tangram Puzzle is the best and free new Polygon Art Coloring Game . It is perfectly designed for both Children and Adult.

Very simple intuitive gameplay. Your task is to combine colorful image from pieces of different shapes and you can share them with your friends . It will give them the opportunity to develop sense of beauty and sense of art.

Challenge your skills in Timer mode. It seems impossible at first time, but then you will be wondered how your skills develop as you play.

It is the latest color by number app with beautiful low polygon artworks. It provides jigsaw and coloring puzzles of various styles, which could be 3D effect, animals, birds, cartoon, etc.


HOW To PLAY?
- Select your favourite art puzzle.
- Drag polygon pieces and place them in the correct area.
-Identify the target area either by color or shape.
-Play like a jigsaw puzzle.
- DONE! And don’t forget to SHARE your work with friends!

KEY FEATURES:
-Two Playing Modes.
-fantastic artworks
-Relieve Stress
-Advance your logical thinking and memory;
-More Than 60+ artworks.
-Mind Soothing Sound Effects.
-Compete for the top-score on Game Center leaderboards


Download this for free! Enjoy this puzzle spiel game with modern art. Have a nice day!
